definitions.definition: That part of the skull consisting of the bones enclosing the brain , but not including the bones of the face or jaw .
The upper portion of the skull , including the neurocranium and facial bones , but not including the jawbone ( mandible ).

main_definition: ( anatomy ) That part of the skull consisting of the bones enclosing the brain , but not including the bones of the face or jaw .
secondary_definitions: ( anthropology , informal ) The upper portion of the skull , including the neurocranium and facial bones , but not including the jawbone ( mandible ).
